source: Young, S. L., Kyser, G. B., Barney, J. N., Claassen, V. P., & DiTomaso, J. M. (2010). Spatio_Temporal Relationship between Water Depletion and Root Distribution Patterns of Centaurea solstitialis and Two Native Perennials. Restoration Ecology, 18, 323-333.

notes_2: "Depending on climate, it can be grown as either an annual or as a perennial."
